mapper.select: SELECT R.REV_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, R.GOOD_NO, R.REV_TITLE, R.REV_CONTENT, R.COUNT, R.STAR_RATING, R.CREATE_DATE, R.DELETE_DATE FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN GOODS G ON R.GOOD_NO = G.GOOD_NO WHERE M.STATUS IS NULL AND R.DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND G.DELETE_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY R.REV_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM REVIEW_FILE WHERE REV_NO = ${rno} AND DELETE_DATE IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM REVIEW_REPLY WHERE REV_NO = ${rno} AND DELETE_DATE IS NULL

SELECT GF.FILE_NO , GF.SELL_NO , GF.ORIGINAL_NAME , GF.CHANGE_NAME , GF.CREATE_DATE , GF.DELETE_DATE FROM GOODS_FILE GF JOIN GOODS_SELL GS ON GS.SELL_NO = GF.SELL_NO WHERE GS.GOOD_NO = #{gno} AND GS.DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND GF.DELETE_DATE IS NULL

SELECT GS.SELL_NO, GS.SELLER_NO, GS.GOOD_NO, G.GOOD_TITLE, GS.SELL_CONTENT, G.PRICE, GS.CREATE_DATE, GS.DELETE_DATE FROM GOODS_SELL GS JOIN GOODS G ON G.GOOD_NO = GS.GOOD_NO WHERE GS.GOOD_NO = #{gno} AND GS.DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND G.DELETE_DATE IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE REV_NO = #{rno} AND DELETE_DATE IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT R.REV_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, R.GOOD_NO, R.REV_TITLE, R.REV_CONTENT, R.COUNT, R.STAR_RATING, R.CREATE_DATE, R.DELETE_DATE FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN GOODS G ON R.GOOD_NO = G.GOOD_NO WHERE M.STATUS IS NULL AND R.DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND G.DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND R.REV_NO = #{rno} ORDER BY R.REV_NO DESC
SELECT R.REPLY_NO, R.REV_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, R.REPLY_CONTENT, R.CREATE_DATE, R.DELETE_DATE FROM REVIEW_REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO WHERE REV_NO = #{rno} AND R.DELETE_DATE IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT R.REV_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, R.GOOD_NO, R.REV_TITLE, R.REV_CONTENT, R.COUNT, R.STAR_RATING, R.CREATE_DATE, R.DELETE_DATE FROM REVIEW R JOIN GOODS G ON (R.GOOD_NO = G.GOOD_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN SELLER S ON (G.SELLER_NO = S.SELLER_NO) WHERE R.DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND G.DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND S.DELETE_DATE IS NULL AND M.STATUS IS NULL AND S.SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo} ORDER BY R.REV_NO DESC
SELECT R.REV_NO, G.GOOD_TITLE, R.REV_TITLE, R.CREATE_DATE FROM REVIEW R JOIN GOODS G ON(R.GOOD_NO = G.GOOD_NO) WHERE R.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND R.DELETE_DATE IS NULL
